|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 (ARMADA 300) @1.6GHz
Rear 2x USB Ports are from the USB 3.0 Host Controller :whose configuration is provided by the 2nd Flash.
''NAS 4-BAY-NV+_V4-M6282'' and ''REV: 3.0'' are silkscreened on the main PCB :''NAS 4-BAY-NV+_V4-M6282-BP REV:V1.0'' is silkscreened on the SATA riser :''NAS 4-BAY-NV+_V4-M6282-IO REV:V3.1'' is silkscreened on front LED and USB board
A Winstar WH1602D-TTI-JT 16x2 Dot Matrix LCD Display provides status information.
==Links of Interest== :[http://natisbad.org/NAS5/index.html Debian and upstream kernel]
